name: Under Your Spell
description:
Stupid wizard summoned you and thinks you will cooperate.

features list:

  • you can click things and shit happens
  • Sezam (the wizard) is as androgynously sexy as wizards should be

known issues:

  • The battle mechanic is boring as hell
  • The entire game is built around the aforementioned battle mechanic

___________________________________________________________

  • Graphic: almost everything here is drawn by me
  • Music and SFX: bought in bundles, not created by me

Engine: Ren’py.

The base code for the fight mechanic copied from here.
